attributes.action: The government make, council,s provide park & ride before a levy on diesel cars
attributes.background:
Air pollution is a combination of all traffic, & cities such as Southampton, have done nothing to lessen vehicle movements into the city, unlike many smaller towns & cities.
As an asthmatic I can feel the difference when away from the heavy pollution in none park & ride towns & cities

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask Parliament to change the law, so that councils are not allowed to introduce a levy on diesel cars if they do not have a park and ride system in place.
